spiritsExplanation: The workout is classified primarily as "Outdoor & Adventure" due to the rowing taking place on a river, which is supported by the image showing the setting. This environment is a key indicator. The spirit "High-Energy & Intense" is also strongly represented as evidenced by the use of HIIT format ("2' intervals," "Max rhythm: 32"), and an intensity level of 3 out of 3, suggesting a vigorous session designed to push participants physically. The playlist, featuring energetic songs like "Gotta Get Thru This" and "All Around The World," further supports this high-energy classification. The absence of an instructor doesn't diminish these spirits, as the metadata provides clear signals of both adventure and intensity.
